changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "certificate" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "expires_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL, "display_name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "document_number" VARCHAR(14) NOT NULL, "owner_name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "thumbprint" TEXT NOT NULL, "is_active" BOOLEAN NOT NULL, "account_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("thumbprint") ); CREATE INDEX "idx_certificate_account_is_active" ON "certificate" ("account_id", "is_active") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_certificate_expires_at_active" ON "certificate" ("expires_at") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL;
